def unique_subarrays(lst, k):
    lst.sort()
    (i, j, ans) = (0, 0, 0)
    seen = set()
    while i <= len(lst):
        if lst[i] in seen:
            i += 1
            continue
        while j < len(lst) and lst[j] - lst[i] <= k:
            j += 1
        ans += j - i - 1
        seen.add(lst[i])
        i += 1
    return ans

def unique_subarrays(lst, k):
    lst.sort()
    (i, j, ans) = (0, 0, 0)
    seen = set()
    while i < len(lst):
        if lst[i] in seen:
            i += 1
            continue
        while j < len(lst) and lst[j] * lst[i] <= k:
            j += 1
        ans += j - i - 1
        seen.add(lst[i])
        i += 1
    return ans
